TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProfileBase extends System.Configuration.SettingsBase

summary.span: 提供設定檔屬性值和資訊的不具型別存取。

span.span: Provides untyped access to profile property values and information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 會使用類別來建立使用者設定檔所使用的類別。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有已啟用的使用者設定檔的應用程式啟動時，會建立新的類別類型的`ProfileCommon`，後者繼承自類別。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 強型別存取子會加入至`ProfileCommon`組態區段中定義的每一個屬性的類別。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. 強型別存取子`ProfileCommon`類別呼叫和方法基底類別，擷取和分別設定設定檔屬性值。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the and methods of the base class to retrieve and set profile property values, respectively. 執行個體`ProfileCommon`類別設定的值為ASP.NET 應用程式的屬性。An instance of the `ProfileCommon` class is set as the value of the property for the ASP.NET application. 若要建立 ASP.NET 應用程式的使用者設定檔的執行個體，建議您改用方法。To create an instance of a user profile in an ASP.NET application, it is recommended that you use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示可指定使用者設定檔，其中包含 Web.config 檔`ZipCode`型別的屬性`string`和`RecentSearchList`型別的屬性。The following code example shows a Web.config file that specifies a user profile that contains a `ZipCode` property of type `string` and a `RecentSearchList` property of type . 產生屬性的目前將具有強型別存取子的每一個指定的屬性。The generated property of the current will have strongly typed accessors for each of the specified properties. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範讀取並設定 ASP.NET 網頁`ZipCode`屬性指定的使用者設定檔。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. 然後再嘗試執行此程式碼，提供者設定為預設`AspNetSqlProvider`在網站上的 ASP.NET 組態設定。Before attempting to run this code, set the provider to the default `AspNetSqlProvider` in the ASP.NET configuration settings for the Web site. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例定義一個類別，繼承自類別來建立自訂的設定檔。The following code example defines a class that inherits from the class to create a custom profile. 已在指定的自訂設定檔類型`inherits`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的組態項目的屬性。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]

block.para:
您可以建立自訂設定檔實作繼承自抽象類別，並定義使用者設定檔中的組態項目未指定的屬性。
You can create a custom profile implementation that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element.
您可以在 Web.config 檔案中指定的自訂使用者設定檔類型的組態項目，如下列範例所示的屬性。
You can specify a custom user-profile type in the Web.config file with the attribute of the configuration element, as shown in the following example.
程式碼EmployeeProfile類別包含在本主題的範例 > 一節。
The code for the EmployeeProfile class is included in the Example section of this topic.
``` <profile inherits="Samples.AspNet.Profile.EmployeeProfile" defaultProvider="SqlProvider"> <providers> <clear /> <add name="SqlProvider" type="System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" connectionStringName="SqlServices" description="SQL Profile Provider for Sample"/> <add name="EmployeeInfoProvider" type="System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" connectionStringName="SqlServices" description="SQL Profile Provider for Employee Info"/> </providers>
<properties> <add name="GarmentSize" /> </properties> </profile> ```

MemberSignature.Value: public ProfileBase ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: ProfileBase();

summary.span: 建立 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 會使用類別來建立使用者設定檔所使用的類別。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有已啟用的使用者設定檔的應用程式啟動時，會建立新的類別類型的`ProfileCommon`，後者繼承自類別。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 強型別存取子會加入至`ProfileCommon`組態區段中定義的每一個屬性的類別。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. 強型別存取子`ProfileCommon`類別呼叫和方法基底類別，擷取和分別設定設定檔屬性值。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the and methods of the base class to retrieve and set profile property values, respectively. 執行個體`ProfileCommon`類別設定的值為ASP.NET 應用程式的屬性。An instance of the `ProfileCommon` class is set as the value of the property for the ASP.NET application. > [!NOTE] > 用來產生儲存在該類別的基底類別屬性會覆寫使用`inherits`區段的組態檔的屬性。The base class used to generate the class stored in the property can be overridden using the `inherits` attribute of the section of the configuration file. 在此情況下，您會指定自訂的類別繼承自基底類別。In this case you would specify a custom class that inherits from the base class. 這個建構函式不是從應用程式程式碼使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from application code. 若要建立使用者設定檔的執行個體，請使用方法。To create an instance of a user profile, use the method. ## Examples 下列的 Web.config 檔會指定使用者設定檔，其中包含`ZipCode`型別的屬性`string`和`RecentSearchList`型別的屬性。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains a `ZipCode` property of type `string` and a `RecentSearchList` property of type . 產生屬性的目前將具有強型別存取子的每一個指定的屬性。The generated property of the current will have strongly typed accessors for each of the specified properties. ``` ``` 讀取下列 ASP.NET 網頁，並設定`ZipCode`屬性指定的使用者設定檔。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Used by ASP.NET to create an instance of a profile for the specified user name.
An that represents the profile for the specified user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立並初始化新的設定檔執行個體，並使用自訂設定檔的應用程式物件，或管理使用者設定檔，在非 ASP.NET 的環境中很有用。The method creates and initializes a new profile instance and is useful for applications that use a custom profile object or manage user profiles in a non-ASP.NET environment. 這個多載方法會假設指定的使用者名稱是已驗證的使用者。This overload of the method assumes that the specified user name is an authenticated user. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立自訂設定檔物件的執行個體、 設定屬性，並儲存到資料來源的設定檔。The following code example creates an instance of a custom profile object, sets a property, and saves the profile to the data source. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create/CS/profileBaseCreatecs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create/VB/profileBaseCreatevb.aspx.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase GetProfileGroup (string groupName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase GetProfileGroup(string groupName) cil managed
Public Function GetProfileGroup (groupName As String) As ProfileGroupBase
public: System::Web::Profile::ProfileGroupBase ^ GetProfileGroup(System::String ^ groupName);

span.span: The name of the group of properties.

summary.span: 取得由群組名稱識別的屬性群組。

span.span: Gets a group of properties identified by a group name.

returns.span: 物件，表示使用指定群組名稱所設定的屬性群組。

span.span: A object for a group of properties configured with the specified group name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定檔屬性可以分成較佳的組織的群組。Profile properties can be separated into groups for better organization. 屬性可以用來擷取一組屬性，依照群組名稱。The property can be used to retrieve a group of properties by the group name. 您也可以藉由指定的群組名稱的成員身分來存取群組中的設定檔內容`Profile`每個頁面上所提供的屬性。You can also access a profile property in a group by specifying the group name as a member of the `Profile` property available on each page. 例如，`ZipCode`設定檔內容的成員`Address`無法使用存取設定檔群組`Profile.Address.ZipCode`。For example, the `ZipCode` profile property that is a member of the `Address` profile group could be accessed using `Profile.Address.ZipCode`. ## Examples 下列的 Web.config 檔會指定使用者設定檔，其中包含與群組名稱的屬性群組`Address`。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains group of properties with a group name of `Address`. 針對產生的群組的屬性屬性的目前會加上的群組名稱。The grouped properties generated for the property of the current will be preceded by the group name. 例如，`Profile.Address.Street`。For example, `Profile.Address.Street`. ``` ``` 下列 ASP.NET 網頁讀取，並設定指定使用者設定檔的群組的屬性。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 在組態區段中找不到指定的設定檔屬性群組名稱。

span.span: The specified profile property group name was not found in the configuration section.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetPropertyValue (string propertyName);

Public Function GetPropertyValue (propertyName As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetPropertyValue(System::String ^ propertyName);

span.span: The name of the profile property.
Gets the value of a profile property.

returns.span: 指定的設定檔屬性值，型別為 。

span.span: The value of the specified profile property, typed as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 會使用類別來建立使用者設定檔所使用的類別。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有已啟用的使用者設定檔的應用程式啟動時，會建立新的類別類型的`ProfileCommon`，後者繼承自類別。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 強型別存取子會加入至`ProfileCommon`組態區段中定義的每一個屬性的類別。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. 強型別存取子`ProfileCommon`類別呼叫方法來擷取不具類型的值從產生的存取子，然後將轉換成指定的型別並傳回做為屬性值。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to retrieve untyped values from the that the generated accessor then casts as the specified type and returns as the property value. 您可以使用依名稱擷取您的應用程式的使用者設定檔的屬性值的方法。You can use the method to retrieve property values of the user profile for your application by name. 傳回的值都不具類型，且必須轉換成擷取時的特定物件類型。Returned values are untyped and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved. 強型別存取設定檔屬性值，您可以存取屬性名稱的每個頁面，可用的設定檔屬性的成員身分，例如`Profile.CustomerAddress`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of the Profile property available on each page, for example, `Profile.CustomerAddress`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範讀取並設定 ASP.NET 網頁`ZipCode`屬性指定的使用者設定檔。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. Web.config 檔案中指定的使用者設定檔屬性的範例，請參閱提供的範例類別。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: There are no properties defined for the current profile.
-or-

exception.span: 目前的設定檔中沒有指定的設定檔屬性名稱。

span.span: The specified profile property name does not exist in the current profile.
-or-

span.span: The provider for the specified profile property did not recognize the specified property.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Initialize (string username, bool isAuthenticated);
.method public hidebysig instance void Initialize(string username, bool isAuthenticated) cil managed
Public Sub Initialize (username As String, isAuthenticated As Boolean)
public: void Initialize(System::String ^ username, bool isAuthenticated);

param.name: username
param.span: 要初始化設定檔的使用者名稱。

span.span: The name of the user to initialize the profile for.

param.name: isAuthenticated
param.span: 表示使用者已驗證， 表示使用者為匿名。

span.span: to indicate the user is authenticated; to indicate the user is anonymous.

summary.span: 初始化目前使用者的設定檔屬性值和資訊。

span.span: Initializes the profile property values and information for the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法並不適合從程式碼使用。This method is not intended to be used from your code. 使用其中一種多載來建立使用者設定檔的執行個體。Use one of the overloads to create an instance of the user profile.

.property instance bool IsAnonymous
Public ReadOnly Property IsAnonymous As Boolean
public: property bool IsAnonymous { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得布林值，指出使用者設定檔是否供匿名使用者使用。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the user profile is for an anonymous user.

value.span: 如果設定檔是供匿名使用者使用則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user profile is for an anonymous user; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用匿名存取的使用者設定檔使用的組態區段和`allowAnonymous`用來指定設定檔屬性的組態項目的屬性。Anonymous access to the user profile is enabled using the configuration section and the `allowAnonymous` attribute of the configuration element used to specify profile properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsDirty { get; }
.property instance bool IsDirty
Public ReadOnly Property IsDirty As Boolean
public: property bool IsDirty { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得布林值，指出設定檔屬性是否已修改。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether any of the profile properties have been modified.

value.span: 如果設定檔屬性已修改則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if any of the profile properties have been modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以用設定檔提供者期間方法，以判斷屬性是否構成的基本型別，字串，或物件已變更。The property can be used by a profile provider during the method to determine whether properties that are made up of primitive types, strings, or objects have been changed. 然後會更新已變更的屬性中的設定檔提供者方法。Changed properties are then updated by the profile provider in the method. 方法會自動呼叫結尾的頁面執行屬性 `true`The method is automatically called at the end of page execution if the property is `true` 的設定檔提供者方法明確地無法判斷是否已變更的自訂類別類型或複雜類型，例如集合、 設定檔屬性。A profile provider called in the method cannot explicitly determine whether a profile property with a custom class type or a complex type, such as a collection, has changed. 您可以使用事件判斷是否已經修改自訂物件，並且將繼續進行自動儲存的已修改的物件或取消自動儲存，如果已修改的物件。You can use the event to determine whether a custom object has been modified and to continue with the automatic save for modified objects or cancel the automatic save if no objects have been modified. 預設行為類別是要設定屬性`true`存取的屬性都是自訂或複雜類型的第一個時間屬性。The default behavior of the class is to set the property to `true` for properties that are of a custom or complex type the first time the property is accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object this[string propertyName] { get; set; }
.property instance object Item(string)
Default Public Overrides Property Item(propertyName As String) As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ default[System::String ^] { System::Object ^ get(System::String ^ propertyName); void set(System::String ^ propertyName, System::Object ^ value); };

span.span: The name of the profile property.

summary.span: 取得或設定由屬性名稱索引的設定檔屬性值。

span.span: Gets or sets a profile property value indexed by the property name.

value.span: 指定的設定檔屬性值，型別為 。

span.span: The value of the specified profile property, typed as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來擷取，或依名稱設定應用程式的使用者設定檔的屬性值。You can use this property to retrieve or set the property values of the user profile for your application by name. 傳回的值的型別為`object`，而且必須轉換為擷取時的特定物件類型。Returned values are typed as `object` and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved. 強型別存取設定檔屬性值，您可以存取的屬性名稱的成員身分`Profile`屬性可用在每個頁面上，例如`Profile.CustomerAddress`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of the `Profile` property available on each page, for example, `Profile.CustomerAddress`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例列出的使用者設定檔中的屬性名稱的繫結靜態屬性集合物件加入至控制項。The following code example lists the names of the properties in the user profile by binding the property from the static collection of objects to a control. 選取的屬性值，使用名稱來擷取集合。The selected property value is retrieved by name using the collection. Web.config 檔案中指定的使用者設定檔屬性的範例，請參閱提供的範例類別。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. span.span: Gets the most recent date and time that the profile was read or modified.

value.span: 設定檔最近由預設提供者讀取或修改的日期和時間。

span.span: The most recent date and time that the profile was read or modified by the default provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性值只能被修改預設設定檔提供者。This property value is only modified by the default profile provider. 對設定檔屬性的預設設定檔提供者以外的提供者所做的變更不會影響值屬性。Changes made to profile properties by a provider other than the default profile provider do not affect the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來取得設定的應用程式，包括屬性名稱和類型的設定檔屬性的相關資訊。You can use this property to get information about the profile properties configured for an application, including property names and types. 您也可以參考每個屬性。You can also reference the of each property. A管理儲存和擷取資料來源的屬性值。A manages storage and retrieval of property values to and from the data source. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例列出的使用者設定檔中的屬性名稱的繫結靜態屬性集合物件加入至控制項。The following code example lists the names of the properties in the user profile by binding the property from the static collection of objects to a control. 選取的屬性值，使用名稱來擷取集合。The selected property value is retrieved by name using the collection. Web.config 檔案中指定的使用者設定檔屬性的範例，請參閱提供的範例類別。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public override void Save ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Save() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Save ()
public: override void Save();

summary.span: 使用已變更的設定檔屬性值，更新設定檔資料來源。

span.span: Updates the profile data source with changed profile property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將已修改的設定檔屬性值寫入至資料來源。The method writes modified profile property values to the data source. 設定檔提供者可以減少在資料來源的活動執行更新時，才屬性設定為`true`。The profile provider can reduce the amount of activity at the data source by performing updates only when the property is set to `true`. 這是預設的情況。This is the case for the default . 之後方法已儲存至資料來源的屬性值設`false`。After the method has saved the property values to the data source, is set to `false`. 您可以使用事件，以實作自訂邏輯，判斷是否已修改的自訂型別或複雜類型的設定檔屬性，並繼續進行自動儲存的已修改的物件或取消自動儲存，如果沒有任何物件具有已修改。You can use the event to implement custom logic that determines whether a profile property with a custom type or a complex type has been modified and continue with the automatic save for modified objects or cancel the automatic save if no objects have been modified.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetPropertyValue (string propertyName, object propertyValue);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetPropertyValue(string propertyName, object propertyValue) cil managed
Public Sub SetPropertyValue (propertyName As String, propertyValue As Object)
public: void SetPropertyValue(System::String ^ propertyName, System::Object ^ propertyValue);

span.span: The name of the property to set.
The value to assign to the property.
Sets the value of a profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 會使用類別來建立使用者設定檔所使用的類別。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有已啟用的使用者設定檔的應用程式啟動時，會建立新的類別類型的`ProfileCommon`，後者繼承自類別。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 強型別存取子會加入至`ProfileCommon`組態區段中定義的每一個屬性的類別。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. 強型別存取子`ProfileCommon`類別呼叫方法以傳遞屬性值來儲存在資料來源。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to pass property values to the to be stored at the data source. 您可以使用方法，以將您的應用程式的使用者設定檔中的屬性值指派名稱。You can use the method to assign property values in the user profile for your application by name. 值不具型別，而型別檢查都是在執行階段，而不是編譯時間。Values are untyped, and type checking will be done at run time, not compile time. 強型別存取設定檔屬性值，您可以存取的屬性名稱的成員身分`Profile`屬性可在每個頁面上，例如`Profile.CustomerAddress`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of the `Profile` property that is available on each page, for example, `Profile.CustomerAddress`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範讀取並設定 ASP.NET 網頁`ZipCode`屬性指定的使用者設定檔。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. Web.config 檔案中指定的使用者設定檔屬性的範例，請參閱提供的範例類別。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). MemberSignature.Value: public string UserName { get; }
.property instance string UserName
Public ReadOnly Property UserName As String
public: property System::String ^ UserName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得設定檔的使用者名稱。

span.span: Gets the user name for the profile.

value.span: 設定檔的使用者名稱，或指派給設定檔的匿名使用者識別項。

span.span: The user name for the profile or the anonymous-user identifier assigned to the profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回已驗證的使用者設定檔相關聯的名稱或如果指派給設定檔的匿名使用者識別項屬性是`true`。The property returns either the name of the authenticated user that the profile is associated with or the anonymous user identifier assigned to the profile if the property is `true`. 啟用匿名存取的使用者設定檔使用的組態區段和`allowAnonymous`用來指定設定檔屬性的組態項目的屬性。Anonymous access to the user profile is enabled using the configuration section and the `allowAnonymous` attribute of the configuration element used to specify profile properties.
